alert.note: Alert for Orleans; St. Bernard; St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 1:48PM CDT until April 15 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. BERNARD...NORTHEASTERN ORLEANS AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. TAMMANY PARISHES...HARRISON AND EASTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 147 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Diamondhead to 7 miles southeast of Pearlington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, D`iberville, Lake Catherine, Violet, Kiln, Pearlington, Lyman, Shoreline Park, Saucier and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 6 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
